faqs.response: Our working hours are from 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM, Monday to Saturday.
We offer a variety of travel packages including domestic and international tours, adventure trips, and customized itineraries.
To book a trip, visit our website, select your desired package, and follow the booking instructions provided.
We recommend purchasing travel insurance for your trip. It covers unexpected events like trip cancellations or medical emergencies.
You can contact our support team at +91-9542226777 or email us at info@makeamove.co.in
Cancellations made 7 days before travel are fully refundable. After that, charges may apply.
We accept UPI, debit/credit cards, net banking, and wallet payments.
Our head office is located at 3rd Floor, BRK News, Banjara Hills, Rd.No.11, Hyderabad.
To book a package, simply go to the 'Packages' section, choose your trip, and click on 'Book Now'.
We frequently run offers! Visit the 'Offers' section or subscribe to our newsletter to stay updated.
Our customer support is available from 9:00 AM to 8:00 PM, Monday to Saturday.
Hello! How can I assist you today?
You're welcome! If you have any more questions, feel free to ask.
Make a Move is a travel agency specializing in personalized travel experiences. We aim to make your journey memorable and hassle-free.
